title: Mighty Mike
overview: Adorable dogs? Tick. Mega cute kittens? Tick. Mischievous raccoons? Tick. Funny animals getting into crazy adventures, riding skateboards, and generally being awesome? Double and triple tick! Mighty Mike is a pug with a big heart and a short temper. Join him and his pals as they explore the house, their neighbourhood, and have loads of fun adventures!
